name: SWS Latex Waist Shaper  XS-3X
description:
Train your waist with the Long Latex Shaper. The Long Latex Shaper is a superior body shaper that accelerates weight loss through high compression, perspiration, and micro massage. This shaper helps you get the figure you've always wanted by instantly lifting, shaping, and slimming the body. As well as, flattening your stomach, waist, and hips. To lose weight and reduce measurements, it is recommended to wear the shaper between 6-8 hours a day. 

The SWS Latex Waist Shaper is considered "high-compression" and is intended to have a tight fit. If your stomach is a little larger, choose a size up to ensure fit. 

ALL OF OUR SHAPERS ARE AUTHENTIC AND IMPORTED FROM COLUMBIA

-Helps you loose those extra inches
-Provides abdominal support

name: Workout Waist Shaper-Pink XS-2X
description:
The classic gym waist shaper firms, tightens, and tones the stomach while doing everyday activities. This shaper is Short, It only covers the mid section. The Workout Shaper is for the gym, walking or running outside. It creates compression in your core, stimulating thermal activity.

The SWS Workout Shaper is considered "high-compression" and is intended to have a tight fit. If your stomach is a little larger, choose a size up to ensure fit. 

HOW IT WORKS: You put on your waist shaper, the action creates compression in the core, stimulating thermal activity and ramping perspiration. This process allows toxins and impurities to exit the skin while mobilizing fat cells.

name: FIRST CLEANSE DETOX
description:
Everything you need for a powerfully effective cleansing experience. Formulated to provide comprehensive support for the body's natural elimination channels.* With proven herbs and fiber that work synergistically to help cleanse and rejuvenate the body, working deeply to gently remove harmful toxins, enhance digestion and restore vibrant health and energy.*

*Ideal for first time users
*Simple 2 week morning & evening formula
*Essential detox & cleansing components
*Over 30 safe & effective natural ingredients
Instruction guide with diet & lifestyle tips
Access to free expert advice on cleansing & detox
AM Detoxify
*Proven herbs and a triple fiber blend*
*Provides comprehensive support of the 7 channels of elimination: liver, lungs, skin, lymphatic system, kidneys, blood and digestive system*
PM Capture & Eliminate
Gentle yet effective natural laxative formula promotes bowel regularity and helps relieve occasional constipation.*
A balanced blend of soluble & insoluble fiber helps to absorb and eliminate toxins in the digestive tract.*
What are the benefits of natural cleansing & detoxification?

*Better digestion*
*Bowel regularity*
*Weight loss*
*Flatter abdomen*
*Enhanced immunity*
*More energy*
*Clearer mind & body*
*Less bloating*
Contains no GMOs, yeast, wheat, corn, soy, salt, sugars, dairy, animal products, fillers, binders, preservatives or artificial ingredients.


Made in USA


Morning Formula: For the first 3 days, take 1 capsule each day in the morning on an empty stomach. After 3 days, take 2 capsules each day in the morning.

Evening Formula: For the first 3 days take 1 capsule each day in the evening. After 3 days, take 2 capsules each day in the evening.

Please read accompanying literature. Store in a dry place at 59-86°F (15-30°C).
